resources.string:
"
 Author: Michael Palmer 
 Version: 1 
 Instructions: 
 Click on setting to see detailed controls.

"
 Author: Michael Palmer 
 Version: 1 
 Instructions: 
 Click 'Open' button to open garage door. 
 Click 'Close' button to close garage door. 
 Click 'Stop' button to stop garage door.

"
 Author: Michael Palmer 
 Version: 1 
 Instructions: 
 Click 'Off' button to turn off garage light. 
 Click 'On' button to turn on garage light.

"
 Author: Michael Palmer 
 Version: 1 
 Instructions: 
 Click 'Set' button to set house temperature.

"
 Author: Michael Palmer 
 Version: 1 
 Instructions: 
 Progress bar shows progress of outside weather download. 
 Current, Minimum, and Maximum Outside Temperatures are populated.
